text: @SpeakerPelosi JUST reading that 100,000.00 PEOPLE HUMAN beings HAVE DIED due to the coronavirus pandemic is.....just unimaginable. WHY WHY WHY?? And YOU ALL KNOW THE answer!!💯😡😡 GET OUT & VOTE FOR YOUR LIVES!!USA HAS LOST THE RESPECT OF OUR FOREIGN COUNTERPARTS!! SAD 😥!!WAKE UP FOLKS!
